1370: Riquardus moved to De Tuyt.A.7 after marriage.
Got married to Wendelmodis at age 24 in 1370.
Had a son with Wendelmodis, Heyman, at age 24.
1371: Had a son with Wendelmodis, Remdo, at age 25.
1373: Had a daughter with Wendelmodis, Ermegardis, at age 27.
1376: Had a daughter with Wendelmodis, Gisele, at age 30.
1377: Had a daughter with Wendelmodis, Oda, at age 31.
Lost son Heyman when Heyman was 8 years old.
Lost daughter Ermegardis when Ermegardis was 5 years old.
1378: Had a son with Wendelmodis, Kerstiaen, at age 32.
1379: Lost son Passelin when Passelin was 0 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
Wendelmodis gave birth to their stillborn son Passelin in 1379.
1380: Became caretaker of Remdo, Gisele, Oda, Kerstiaen at age 35.
